concept.title: Copy Attribute Tool Item
concept.shortdesc: The copy attributes tool item is located in the top element control toolbar and represented by an eye-dropper with an 'a' next to it.

section.p: The purpose of this tool is to copy the attributes of one element, to 'paste' them on other elements

To use this tool, select the element you wish to copy attributes from. Then click the tool item, it will become enabled. Now each element you click on will take the attributes of first selected element.

The tool will not enable if no elements are selected when pressing the tool item. It will also not enable if more than one element is selected, as this tool is for copying over one elements attributes only.
